Ability.Name: -- Rotation Switcher --
Ability.Lua:
local playerLevel = UnitLevel("Player")
if playerLevel < 10 then PQR_SwapRotation("Starter (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif playerLevel < 85 and playerLevel >= 10 then local talentTree = GetPrimaryTalentTree()
if talentTree == 1 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Arms (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Fury (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 3 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Tank (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") end elseif playerLevel == 85 then local talentTree = GetPrimaryTalentTree()
if talentTree == 1 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Arms (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Fury (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 3 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Tank (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") end end

Ability.Name: -- Load LUA --
Ability.Lua: if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_Firepong.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put the file PQR_Firepong.lua in the Data file for this profile to work properly!!!", "Error") PQR_RotationStop() return true end end end
